Reviews.Title: “Best Value at the Beach”
Reviews.Author: Dave T
Reviews.Content: stayed september thru december 2011 recently relocated looking term apartment attest ritz carlton beach simply deal beach located nice surrounded handful restaurants grocery store gas stations beachcomber close nightlife pb offer short 25 block walk world famous surf park base la mt beaches la jolla pacific beach crystal pier belmont park sea world downtown san diego miles person looking inexpensive stay plans seeing sights hotel anyway excellent deal 300 week staff attentive whenever ive seen helping tenants midnight women office absolutely caliber care intent stay enjoyable definitely recommend beachcomber traveling stay beach forking hundreds dollars night mind beach considered home town type discounted rate 40 night nice nicer enjoy stay wont regret

Reviews.Title: “"Don't expect the 'Hilton' .. good value for a WEEKLY studio-type room"”
Reviews.Author: dtabse
Reviews.Content: lived pacific beach moving affordable convenient stay transition looking housing rentals yes suit rate week cash deposit refunded thats 40day reasonable roomy clean friendly free wifi queen bed tile floor minifrig cable tv gas stove top walking distance eateries little shops 24hr mart grocery store 2 blocks beach recommend looking bargain okay fancy upgrades enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “NICE place GREAT location”

Reviews.Content: perfect north pacific beach location close beach sea world shopping tons food zoo etc easy walk local beaches sunsets ca nice professional staff including occasional visit owners ill thanks shores
